welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dar es Salaam, the vibrant port city known for its beautiful beaches, rich culture, and bustling markets. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the charm of this coastal gem. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.address: Jamhuri St (Mrima St), Dar es Salaam
